mapper.select: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by story_id desc) as story_no, story_id, story_photo, story_title, story_content from pet_story ps) ps2 where ps2.story_no BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
select pet_id, story_date, story_photo, story_title, story_content from pet_story where story_id = #{story_id}
